comments.body: Sorry, back and forth with myself over this. I think deleting the VPC is failing because this security group never gets cleaned up. "{{ eks_cluster_name }}-worker-sg" and "{{ eks_cluster_name }}-control-plane-sg" get deleted but not this one.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@    description: "EKS Control Plane Security Group"
    rules:
      - group_name: "{{ eks_cluster_name }}-workers-sg"
        group_desc: "EKS Worker Security Group"
        ports: 443
